SuiteInformation.Title: Game Development
SuiteInformation.Description: A collection of benchmarks of relevance to game developers around asset creation, texture compression, compiling game engines, etc. This suite isn't exhaustive out of all tests within the Phoronix Test Suite / OpenBenchmarking.org that may be relevant to game developers but rather some common and likely workloads of interest without being too verbose with the many imaging, audio processing, and renderer benchmarks, etc. See the creator test suite for further tests likely of interest.
